summary: EXHAUST FUMES LEAKED INTO THE PASSENGER COMPARTMENT.  THE DEALER PROVIDED THE CONSUMER WITH A NEW VEHICLE AND THE SAME PROBLEM HAPPENED.  THE DEALER ALSO STATED THAT THIS WOULD HAPPEN 300-500 MILES  AFTER AN OIL CHANGE.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED A REFUND OF THE PURCHASE AMOUNT.    *MR  *SCC   *NLM
